org.xflatdb.xflat.db

Class ConvertingTable<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xflatdb.xflat.db.TableBase<T>
      • org.xflatdb.xflat.db.ConvertingTable<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Table<T>

    public class ConvertingTable<T>
extends TableBase<T>
implements Table<T>
    A table implementation that converts objects to elements using the database's conversion service.

      • findAll

        public java.util.List<T> findAll(XPathQuery query)
        Description copied from interface: Table
        Gets a list of all the values matching the Xpath query. This is the same as #find(org.xflatdb.xflat.query.XpathQuery) but without the hassle of a cursor.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        query - The query to match.
        Returns:

               throws KeyNotFoundException
        Description copied from interface: Table
        Applies an update to the data in a given row.
        Specified by:
        update in interface Table<T>
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the row to match.
        update - The update to apply.
        Returns:
        true if the update actually applied, false if the row was found but the update did not select an existing document element.
